summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing shipping charges and adjustments for various shipments. It includes specific charges, discounts, and payment instructions, indicating Epstein's use of FedEx services for shipping.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein

Epstein sent a shipment to Rosalie Rledmen from his address.

events.title: FedEx Invoice Issued
events.description: An invoice was issued to Jeffrey E. Epstein detailing shipping charges and adjustments.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated March 15, 2004, and details shipping charges totaling USD 114.39.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the account holder for the FedEx services referenced in the invoice.
Multiple shipments are detailed, with various recipients including Michael Bay, Kelly Spann, and Rosalie Rledmen.
The document includes information about discounts applied to the shipping charges.
There are references to adjustments and reasons for potential invoice adjustments.
